scripts.build_chrome: rm -r dist_chrome && vite build --emptyOutDir && mv dist dist_chrome && cp src/chrome.manifest.json dist_chrome/manifest.json && cp src/background.js dist_chrome/assets/ && cp -r src/assets/icons dist_chrome/
scripts.build_firefox: rm -r dist_firefox && vite build --emptyOutDir && mv dist dist_firefox && cp src/firefox.manifest.json dist_firefox/manifest.json && cp src/background.js dist_firefox/assets/ && cp -r src/assets/icons dist_firefox/
